sentences.english: And the much-awaited announcement of the bank rescue plan left everyone confused rather than reassured.
sentences.chinese: 而期待已久的银行救援计划让众人疑惑而非放心。

sentences.english: "The immigrants for NCEE" is a long-standing phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 国际高考移民现象由来已久。

sentences.english: Our long-awaited opening of English and thoughtful, and the campus decorated.
sentences.chinese: 我们盼望已久的英语开放周到了，校园里张灯结彩。

sentences.english: The idea of voice-activated search has been around for some time.
sentences.chinese: 用语音激活进行搜索的设想由来已久。

sentences.english: A few days before the election, I went down to New York for a long-planned fund-raiser.
sentences.chinese: 选举日前几天，我去纽约参加一个筹划已久的筹款会。

sentences.english: Over the past century Salar research outside China has been making slow progresses.
sentences.chinese: 海外的撒拉族研究工作虽然由来已久，然而进展缓慢。

sentences.english: In contrast, marriage has long been known to mellow men out.
sentences.chinese: 相反，婚姻使男人变成熟则已久为人知。

sentences.english: This is about a long-standing disagreement between China and Japan that flares up occassionally.
sentences.chinese: 中国和日本之间的这个分歧由来已久，偶尔会爆发。

sentences.english: Listen to Jason and Marni discuss this long-awaited action movie combination.
sentences.chinese: 请听詹森和玛尼如何讨论这部期待已久的动作片。

sentences.english: Make you enjoy a long-lost "kingdom of Sunbird deity".
sentences.chinese: 让您走进一个失落已久的“太阳神鸟王国”。

sentences.english: She readvertisement the long-ould likeiciphadvertisementd letter with a tearful smile.
sentences.chinese: 她带着含泪的微笑读那封巴望已久的信。

sentences.english: The Regional Science and related disciplines have long been concentrating on the location problem.
sentences.chinese: 区域科学及其相关学科对区位问题的关注由来已久。

sentences.english: Maggot medicine, in fact, has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，蛆疗法由来已久。

sentences.english: The animals remember people even after long separation.
sentences.chinese: 马能记起分别已久的人。

sentences.english: The movie which I long-waited was released today.
sentences.chinese: 我期待已久的电影今天上映了。

sentences.english: He says that Jesus is the Messiah that the Old Testament long prophesied.
sentences.chinese: 他说耶稣就是旧约预言已久的弥赛亚。

definition: (of alcohol) to ferment/(of a crisis) to be brewing/to mull over (an issue)/to hold exploratory discussions
to begin to stir (idiom)/to get restless/to become threatening
in the past always/for a long time now/until now
to be unable to hold back
